channel.title: Supplement on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Supplement on VitaminDWiki

item.title: Supplements taken by the founder of VitaminDWiki
item.description:
Supplements: taken daily thru once a week

(Manufacturer - rarely important, typically popular on Amazon)

Daily

  • Magnesium Co-Factor VDR activate** 400 mg in water

  • need >100 mg average daily MgCl (bulk crystal, disolved in water)

  • Omega-3 Co-Factor* - tend to take it the in morning, (Coromega - tastes great)

    • Must also decrease Omega-6 to get the benefit from Omega-3: See Omega-3 index - many studies|Omega-3 index home test

Every 2 days

item.title: Vitamin D was the most popular supplement during the COVID Pandemic
item.description:
A Global Overview of Dietary Supplements: Regulation, Market Trends, Usage during the COVID-19 Pandemic, and Health Effects

Nutrients 2023, 15(15), 3320; https://doi.org/10.3390/nu15153320

by Ouarda Djaoudene 1,*ORCID,Anabela Romano 2,*ORCID,Yasmine Djedjiga Bradai 1,Feriel Zebiri 1ORCID,Amina Ouchene 1,Yasmine Yousfi 1,Meriem Amrane-Abider 1,Yasmine Sahraoui-Remini 1 and Khodir Madani 1

  • 1 Centre de Recherche en Technologies Agroalimentaires, Route de Targa Ouzemmour, Campus Universitaire, Bejaia 06000, Algeria

  • 2 MED—Mediterranean Institute for Agriculture, Environment and Development, CHANGE—Global Change and Sustainability Institute, Faculdade de Ciências e Tecnologia, Universidade do Algarve, Campus de Gambelas, 8005-139 Faro, Portugal

item.title: Co-factors increase Vitamin D response for the GRH cohort
item.description:
Important Nutrients to Make Sure You Are Getting Along with Vitamin D

Grassrootshealth

The calculations below show how much more supplemental vitamin D was needed, on average, for participants to achieve a vitamin D level of at least 40 ng/ml (100 nmol/L), for those not taking each nutrient in supplement form compared to those taking each nutrient.

  • 244% more D needed if not taking both magnesium and K2
